postText: The graffiti on Spooner St bus stop has been cleaned off.

Hey neighbors, we are throwing a party on the 16th Feb and wanted to let you know that there might be a few more cars parked around Angus Street and surrounds. We will be keeping the noise to a minimum and guests know to keep quiet when leaving! Text me if you have any issues at 040404040401.
Selling our 2-year-old TV as we have just updated our whole system. It is an LG 3000 and is in great working order. Feel free to come and see for yourself.
Reminder: Community meeting tonight at the local community center to discuss upcoming roadworks.
Lost cat alert! Our beloved tabby cat, Whiskers, has gone missing. If found, please contact me immediately. Reward offered.
Congratulations to our local high school basketball team for winning the championship! Go Tigers!
Emergency water shutdown scheduled for tomorrow from 9 AM to 3 PM for maintenance. Please ensure all faucets are turned off.
Local farmer's market happening this weekend. Come support local vendors and enjoy fresh produce!
Beware of recent car break-ins reported in the area. Remember to lock your vehicles and report any suspicious activity to the authorities.
Community clean-up day scheduled for next Saturday. Volunteers needed to help keep our neighborhood clean and green!
Local charity food drive happening this month. Please consider donating non-perishable food items to help those in need.
Congratulations to our local library for winning the Best Library Award! Thank you to everyone who supports our community library.
Road closure on Main Street this weekend for repairs. Please plan alternate routes.
Number 22 Woodford Avenue has officially submitted their renovation plans to be approved by the DA. Please review on the council site.
Updates to our grandstand are underway. It will be happening all on August. Be prepared for noise, trucks, and a great new grandstand.
Construction of the new community park has begun! Exciting times ahead as we work towards creating a green space for everyone to enjoy.
Road resurfacing on Elm Street will commence next week. Expect temporary lane closures and minor delays during construction.
Notice: Utility maintenance work scheduled for tomorrow. Residents may experience temporary water interruptions in the affected area.
Exciting news! The long-awaited bike lanes along Main Avenue have been approved. Get ready to pedal safely through our neighborhood!
Installation of new street lights on Oak Drive is in progress. Brighter and safer streets coming soon!
Moving sale! Selling a gently used sofa and loveseat set. Neutral color, excellent condition. Contact me for more details.
Downsizing and selling our dining table and chairs. Solid wood, seats six comfortably. Great for family dinners or gatherings.
For sale: Baby stroller in good condition. Lightweight and easy to fold. Perfect for strolls around the neighborhood.
Selling a set of gardening tools. Includes shovel, rake, and trowel. Perfect for maintaining your garden this spring!
Moving out and selling our coffee table. Modern design with storage space. Adds a stylish touch to any living room.
Our apartment block has been targeted for package stealing. We are on the corner of Central and Dennis street. We have sent security footage to police.
Attention neighbors! Someone stole my heart last night... and it wasn't the pizza delivery guy! Keep an eye out for any suspiciously charming individuals.
BREAKING NEWS: The notorious 'Culprit Cat' strikes again! This time, stealing socks from the laundry room. Please return all stolen items to their rightful owners (if you can catch him!)
Alert: Mysterious disappearance of snacks from the office kitchen. Suspects include 'Snack Snatcher Sam' and 'Cookie Crumbler Cathy'. Please report any sightings of snack thieves!
